name: com.holoi.xr.holokit
description:
HoloKit is an Augmented Reality(AR) headset that transforms your iPhone into a powerful stereoscopic AR device. With the HoloKit Unity SDK, developers can create immersive AR experiences in Unity, which can be viewed with HoloKit headset.

The SDK's key feature is stereoscopic rendering, allowing for the display of stereo images on the iPhone screen. By attaching your iPhone to the HoloKit, you can enjoy  a captivating AR experience.

HoloKit Unity SDK is compatible with ARFoundation and other AR SDKs.

samples.description: Contains sample project of how to use the stereoscopic rendering feature of the SDK

Contains sample project of how to use the hand gesture recognition feature of the SDK
